reviewText: Bored of the interviews given on the disc.  I purchased it for the strippers.  Just shut up and take your clothes off, no one cares what you have to say.  Erica Campbell is so hot, she is the only reason for the 3 stars.

Erica Campbell, Jamie Lynn, Jelena Jensen, Taylor StClaire, Zoe Britton and , my personal fave, Monica Mendez.  Each girl does a strip that lasts around 7 minutes.  All of the girls have great camera presence.  And some of the shots are definitely NOT suitable for Playboy. My only real criticism is that some of the sets are a little 'forced'.  For example Erica's set is a kitchen, with a bed in it!!! Huh?

In addition there's a short text bio of each girl and a 5 minute interview which is shot with another model as the interviewer.  It's fun to watch the girls just talking, 'course they're both stark naked.  So that's really twelve women.  Three of the interviewers are Tanya Danielle (Erica), Nikki Nova (Zoe) and Devinn Lane (Monica).

Finally, as a bonus, this DVD includes a 10+ minute segment of 'In Bed With Danni' featuring Erica Campbell.  The scene starts with both of them dressed in stockings and corsets. Erica totally fails to answer a bunch of questions about horses.  For which she quickly loses her clothes.  Obviously the two of them wind up lying on the bed, naked.

So in all that's thirteen women.  If you like any of the featured girls then this DVD has some great material for you.  I found that this DVD was better than Virtual Lap Dances I for it's scenes with Erica and Monica.
